body:
Didn't know this was a thing until @alalazo told me, apparently you can have
multiple preferred versions, which helps perl where odd minor versions are
development versions, so we should mark all even minor versions as preferred,
so that for instance `spack spec perl@5:33` concretized to 5.32.x instead of
a development release 5.33.x.
title: perl: prefer all stable releases
